Name: pericardial effusion
Definition: A pericardium disease that is characterized by an abnormal accumulation of fluid in the pericardial cavity.
Synonym: partial loss or necrosis of ear ossicles

Name: pericarditis
Definition: A pericardium disease that is characterized by an inflammation of the pericardium and has_symptom chest pain.

Name: pericardial tuberculosis
Definition: An extrapulmonary tuberculosis that is located_in pericardium resulting in acute pericarditis
